statements: SELECT * FROM sleep_patterns WHERE athlete_id = 1;
SELECT date, total_sleep_hrs FROM sleep_patterns WHERE sleep_quality_rating > 3;
SELECT athlete_id, date, total_sleep_hrs, sleep_quality_rating FROM sleep_patterns WHERE is_nap_taken = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM sleep_patterns ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, MAX(total_sleep_hrs) AS max_sleep_hours FROM sleep_patterns GROUP BY athlete_id;
SELECT * FROM sleep_patterns WHERE athlete_id = 1 AND date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, date, total_sleep_hrs FROM sleep_patterns WHERE total_sleep_hrs > 8
SELECT * FROM sleep_patterns WHERE is_nap_taken = TRUE ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT athlete_id, AVG(total_sleep_hrs) AS avg_sleep_hours FROM sleep_patterns GROUP BY athlete_id
SELECT id, date, sleep_quality_rating FROM sleep_patterns WHERE total_sleep_hrs < 6 ORDER BY sleep_quality_rating DESC
SELECT * FROM SleepPattern;
SELECT id, athlete_id, sleep_date, sleep_start_time, sleep_end_time, sleep_quality FROM SleepPattern WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name FROM Athlete WHERE team = 'Team A';
SELECT sleep_date, sleep_quality FROM SleepPattern WHERE athlete_id = 3 ORDER BY sleep_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SleepPattern WHERE sleep_quality > 8 ORDER BY sleep_quality DESC;
SELECT * FROM SleepPattern WHERE sleep_quality > 5 ORDER BY sleep_date DESC, sleep_end_time ASC
SELECT athlete_id, COUNT(*) AS num_entries FROM SleepPattern GROUP BY athlete_id HAVING num_entries > 3
SELECT a.name, sp.sleep_date, sp.sleep_quality FROM Athlete a INNER JOIN SleepPattern sp ON a.id = sp.athlete_id WHERE a.team = 'Team A' ORDER BY sp.sleep_date ASC
SELECT * FROM SleepPattern sp LEFT JOIN Athlete a ON sp.athlete_id = a.id WHERE sp.sleep_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT AVG(sleep_quality) AS avg_quality, MIN(sleep_quality) AS min_quality, MAX(sleep_quality) AS max_quality FROM SleepPattern GROUP BY athlete_id HAVING avg_quality > 6
SELECT * FROM athletes;
SELECT athlete_name, date_of_birth FROM athletes WHERE height > 180;
SELECT athlete_name, date_of_birth, height, weight FROM athletes ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM sleep_records WHERE hours_slept >= 8 AND sleep_quality >= 7;
SELECT athlete_name, recovery_rating FROM recovery_data WHERE workout_intensity < 3;
SELECT athlete_name, date_of_birth, height FROM athletes;
SELECT * FROM sleep_records WHERE hours_slept > 8 AND sleep_quality >= 5;
SELECT athlete_name, recovery_rating FROM athletes JOIN recovery_data ON athletes.athlete_id = recovery_data.athlete_id WHERE recovery_rating < 3;
SELECT athlete_name, sleep_quality, hours_slept FROM athletes JOIN sleep_records ON athletes.athlete_id = sleep_records.athlete_id ORDER BY sleep_quality DESC, hours_slept ASC;
SELECT athlete_name, date, workout_intensity FROM athletes JOIN recovery_data ON athletes.athlete_id = recovery_data.athlete_id WHERE workout_intensity > 7 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Athletes;
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_age FROM Athletes;
SELECT athlete_id, athlete_gender FROM Athletes WHERE athlete_age > 25;
SELECT * FROM SleepPatterns ORDER BY sleep_date DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, sleep_duration FROM Athletes INNER JOIN SleepPatterns ON Athletes.athlete_id = SleepPatterns.athlete_id WHERE sleep_duration > 6;
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_age FROM Athletes;
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_age, athlete_gender FROM Athletes ORDER BY athlete_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM SleepPatterns SP JOIN Athletes A ON SP.athlete_id = A.athlete_id WHERE SP.sleep_quality > 7;
SELECT A.athlete_name, RD.rest_date, RD.rest_duration, RD.rest_quality FROM Athletes A JOIN RestData RD ON A.athlete_id = RD.athlete_id WHERE RD.rest_quality < 5 ORDER BY RD.rest_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(recovery_score) AS max_score, athlete_name, recovery_date FROM RecoveryStats RS JOIN Athletes A ON RS.athlete_id = A.athlete_id GROUP BY RS.athlete_id ORDER BY max_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM athlete_sleep_patterns;
SELECT athlete_id, date, hours_slept FROM athlete_sleep_patterns ORDER BY athlete_id DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, sleep_quality, date FROM athlete_sleep_patterns WHERE hours_slept > 8;
SELECT MAX(hours_slept) AS max_hours_slept FROM athlete_sleep_patterns;
SELECT athlete_id, COUNT(athlete_id) AS total_records FROM athlete_sleep_patterns GROUP BY athlete_id HAVING COUNT(athlete_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM athlete_sleep_patterns WHERE hours_slept > 8 AND sleep_quality > 8;
SELECT athlete_id, date, hours_slept, sleep_quality FROM athlete_sleep_patterns WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31';
SELECT athlete_id, COUNT(*) AS activities_count FROM athlete_activities GROUP BY athlete_id HAVING activities_count > 5;

SELECT athlete_recovery_metrics.athlete_id, athlete_recovery_metrics.date, athlete_sleep_patterns.hours_slept FROM athlete_recovery_metrics JOIN athlete_sleep_patterns ON athlete_recovery_metrics.athlete_id = athlete_sleep_patterns.athlete_id WHERE athlete_recovery_metrics.recovery_score > 80;
SELECT athlete_id, AVG(sleep_quality) AS avg_sleep_quality FROM athlete_sleep_patterns GROUP BY athlete_id HAVING avg_sleep_quality < 6;
